1.0.0.name: wordpress/oauth2-provider
1.0.0.description:
OAuth2 Complete is a ONE OF A KIND plugin that instanly turns your WordPress webste into a valid OAuth v2 Provider. The plugin is built using OAuth2 Draft 20 standards. The backend is designed or extremly easy use for any level of experience. OAuth is a great tool but leaves most developers behind since it a bit technical. The plugin has aleady done the hard part for you.

Current Features Features:

  • Allows for Single Sign On Abilities
  • Backend Panel for adding Apps/Clients
  • 3 Methods pre built in to allow for a plug and play system
